name: Matt Hooker
bio: Artist guy. I also like motorcycles, cars and music made before 1985.

name: Matt Moore
bio: Since 2014, Hooker and Moore have been covering Charlotte with their murals.

name: William Puckett
bio: Whether you're driving under the Matheson Avenue bridge, grabbing a cup of coffee and a pastry from Amelie's or stopping by the venerable Jack Beagle's for a drink the murals by local artist Will Puckett are a familiar site for Charlotte locals

name: Nick Napoletano
bio: A painter, muralist, and designer known for hyperrealist works brimming with allegory and symbolism
